name: chrome-ext-mapycz
tagline: Simple chrome context menu extension to find stuff on mapy.cz
body:
# About

This is a very simple chrome context menu extension to find selected
text on http://mapy.cz/ . It just opens new a tab with the http://mapy.cz/ search result.

It is for those who are using mapy.cz and find it annoying to copy&paste the address to the mapy.cz search.

# Install
Get it directly from [chrome webstore](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/find-on-mapycz/gmogjpphjifpompcibhiafmlkhdmbbkb) or grab it from source.

# Support
Please use either the [chrome webstore support](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/find-on-mapycz/gmogjpphjifpompcibhiafmlkhdmbbkb/support) or [github issues](https://github.com/w-vi/chrome-ext-mapycz/issues)
